metadata.name: Active Directory Database Snapshot Via ADExplorer
metadata.comment: Detects the execution of Sysinternals ADExplorer with the "-snapshot" flag in order to save a local copy of the active directory database.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\adexplorer.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('adexp') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('snapshot')))

output.summary: Detects the execution of Sysinternals ADExplorer with the "-snapshot" flag in order to save a local copy of the active directory database.
